LanguageData.PrisonLabor_ShowNewsDesc: Showing news about changes in mod when prisoners detected.
LanguageData.PrisonLabor_MotivationWarning: When checked prisoners need to be motivated.\n\nWARINING: Needs reloading save.
LanguageData.PrisonLabor_MotivationIconsDesc: When enabled icons will be displayed above prisoners heads. Blue icon for inspiration, and green icon for gaining motivation by other factors.
LanguageData.PrisonLabor_CanGrowAdvancedDesc: When disabled prisoners can only grow plants that not require any skills.
LanguageData.PrisonLabor_LazyPrisonerExplanationDef: Prisoners are lazy. Try to motivate them.
LanguageData.PrisonLabor_StarvingPrisonerExplanationD: Prisoners are starving and won't work.
LanguageData.PrisonLabor_StarvingPrisonerExplanation: Those prisoners are starving and won't work:\n\n{0}
LanguageData.PrisonLabor_LaborAreaDesc: Labor area is area where only prisoners can work. No colonist's work allowed here except warden type jobs.
LanguageData.PrisonLabor_EnableRevoltsDesc: When enabled revolts will sometimes occur instead of vanilla incidents
LanguageData.PrisonLabor_LaborAreaWarning:
Labor area isn't required to make prisoners work.

This area forbids colonists from working.

It's for situations where you don't want colonists to work in certain area. Prisoners will work anywhere they can enter.
LanguageData.PrisonLabor_ShowTreatmentHappinessDesc: When enabled treatment happiness will be shown in Needs tab.
LanguageData.PrisonLabor_Alert_EscapingPrisoners_Defa: Prisoners can reach end of map and escape. They will run unless colonist will keep an eye on them.
LanguageData.PrisonLabor_ButtonRemoveModFromSaveDesc: Remove Prison Labor mod from save
LanguageData.PrisonLabor_UpgradeSaveDialogMessage: You are going to remove Prison Labor mod from save. After this operation you will be able to play without the mod.
LanguageData.PrisonLabor_BackupSaveDialogMessage: Please backup your file with button below.
LanguageData.PrisonLabor_CommandBedSetOwnerDesc: Assign this bed to be used by a specific prisoner
LanguageData.PrisonLabor_EnableSuicideDesc: Enables suicide of prisoners when they aren't very happy
LanguageData.PrisonLabor_EnableFullHealRestDesc: Prisoner will stay in bed until fully healed
LanguageData.PrisonLabor_MaxNumPrisoner: "Max number of prisoners per gaurd to start lossing motivation (become ineffective)"
